title: Atlas-Mcp-Server
description: ATLAS MCP Server is a Model Context Protocol server that enables hierarchical task management and communication between LLMs and external systems.
creator: cyanheads

ATLAS_STORAGE_DIR.description: Directory path for storing database files and other storage-related resources.

ATLAS_LOG_LEVEL.description: Log level for system operations, such as 'info', 'debug', or 'error'.

ATLAS_DB_MAX_RETRIES.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for database connections.

ATLAS_DB_RETRY_DELAY.description: Time delay in milliseconds between database connection retry attempts.

ATLAS_DB_BUSY_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in milliseconds for handling database busy states.
